title: Japanese Sentence Completion Quiz - Medium Mode
description: Test your Japanese vocabulary and grammar knowledge by completing sentences. This quiz is designed for intermediate learners.
instructions: Fill in the blank with the correct Japanese word in Romaji.
The case (uppercase or lowercase) of your answer does not matter, as long as the spelling is correct.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for scoring.

items.question: Kare wa mainichi _____ ni iku. (He goes to the gym every day.)
Watashi no imouto wa _____ ga jouzu desu. (My younger sister is good at drawing.)
Kono hon wa _____ ni tsuite desu. (This book is about environmental conservation.)
Watashi wa asa _____ wo nomimasu. (I drink green tea in the morning.)
Kare wa _____ de piano wo hiku. (He plays the piano professionally.)
Kono restaurant wa _____ ryouri wo teikyou shimasu. (This restaurant offers vegetarian cuisine.)
Watashi wa _____ ni tsuite benkyou shite imasu. (I am studying about renewable energy.)
Kanojo wa _____ wo tsukatte iru. (She is using a digital camera.)
Watashi wa _____ ni ikitai. (I want to go to a music festival.)
Kare wa _____ wo motte iru. (He has a pet cat.)
